author: Arthur Bloom
title: How To Lift A Quarantine
description: When determining who's safe to work, officials should look at occupational data, not just health data. The post How To Lift A Quarantine appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: When determining who's safe to work, officials should look at occupational data, not just health data.With estimates of coronavirus deaths in the United States continuing to be revised down, politicians and analysts have begun considering how and when to open… [+4447 chars]
